about_the_game: 20 tracks immerse you in the world of hot sand and singing dunes of Kazakhstan, as well as the equally tense relations between resistance units operating in City-545. The soundtrack is crafted in the best traditions of the original Half-Life's sound and incorporates the sounds inherent to the region of Central Asia.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, Strong Language.
